elements.description:
`oe-chart`
 `<oe-chart>` is a charting library which provides polymer based charting components.


### Styling

The following custom properties and mixins are available for styling:

CSS Variable | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--custom-variable-1` | Description of variable | `default value`
`--custom-mixin-1` | Description of mixin | {}

properties.name: aggregateFunctions
properties.description: Map of aggregation functions for different aggregation types like sum,average,etc

properties.name: chartTypes
properties.description: Getter to get the chart Type mappings

properties.name: chartType
properties.description:
Rendered chart's type.
Supported chart types :
area, bubble, groupedbar, line, pareto, pie, donut, normalizedstackedcolumn, stackedbar, stackedcolumn, groupedcolumn, and mapview

properties.name: data
properties.description: Data used to render the chart , if dataUrl is provided this property is not needed.

properties.name: category
properties.description:
Used to define the x-axis in chart.
It accepts a property name from individual elements of provided data.

properties.name: categoryAggregator
properties.description:
Option for the type of aggregation to be done on the category when the values are of 'date'.
Values to be provided are : "year" , "quarter" , "month" or any DateUtil format like 'DD','MM',etc.

properties.name: categorylabelFormat
properties.description: Prefix for the label of x-axis

properties.name: series
properties.description:
Array of objects specifing how the data is rendered across category.
The objects should be of the below structure.

```
{
 'property':'country',   //Property of the data to plot
 'aggregation':'sum',    //Aggregation done on data for the property
 'color':'red'           //Color of the portion of chart representing this data
}
```

properties.name: dataUrl
properties.description: Url to be used to fetch the data for the charts.

properties.name: noDataMessage
properties.description: Empty state message when no data is found.

methods.name: _deepValue
methods.description: Get the value from the 'obj' based on the 'path'.

params.name: obj
params.description: object to navigate

params.name: path
params.description: path for navigation

return.desc: value present in the given path of the obj.

methods.name: debounce

params.name: jobName
params.description: String to identify the debounce job.

params.name: callback
params.description:
Function that is called (with `this`
  context) when the wait time elapses.

params.name: wait
params.description:
Optional wait time in milliseconds (ms) after the
  last signal that must elapse before invoking `callback`

return.desc:
Returns a debouncer object on which exists the
following methods: `isActive()` returns true if the debouncer is
active; `cancel()` cancels the debouncer if it is active;
`flush()` immediately invokes the debounced callback if the debouncer
is active.

methods.name: async
methods.description:
Runs a callback function asynchronously.

By default (if no waitTime is specified), async callbacks are run at
microtask timing, which will occur before paint.

params.name: callback
params.description: The callback function to run, bound to `this`.

params.name: waitTime
params.description:
Time to wait before calling the
  `callback`.  If unspecified or 0, the callback will be run at microtask
  timing (before paint).

return.desc: Handle that may be used to cancel the async job.

methods.name: fire
methods.description: Polymer fire function used to dispatch custom events

params.name: type
params.description: event name

params.name: detail
params.description: data to be sent in the event

params.name: options
params.description: optionals options for the event {bubbles:Boolean,cancelable:Boolean,composed:Boolean,node:HTML Element}

return.desc: Custom event created based on the parameters

methods.name: _getGUID
methods.description: Generates a random GUID used to unqiuely identify the chart container

methods.name: _parameterChanged
methods.description:
Checks if the chart is to be rendered from 'data' property or fetched from 'series' object,
and calls checkrender function.

methods.name: _checkAndRender
methods.description: Checks for valid data and renders the chart after it is structured for chart.

params.name: data
params.description: list of objects to render the chart.

methods.name: _isDataStructured
methods.description: Validates if the data is a chart configuration.

params.name: chartData
params.description: object containing information to render the chart

methods.name: _getSeriesData
methods.description: Computes series data from the data and series.

params.name: data
params.description: list of data to draw chart

params.name: series
params.description: column to get from row

params.name: aggregation
params.description: aggregation function applied

return.desc: list of computed data after aggregation.

methods.name: _getGroups
methods.description: Computes the groups from the list of data

params.name: data
params.description: array of data to group

params.name: category
params.description: property to group the data on

params.name: categoryAggregator
params.description: Aggregator to categorize data.

methods.name: __groupArray
methods.description: Groups a array of objects

params.name: arr
params.description: array of objects to be grouped

params.name: groupCategory
params.description: property or a function to determine grouping

methods.name: __forEach
methods.description: Executes callback function for every record.

params.name: arr
params.description: array to repeat items

params.name: cb
params.description: Function to execute on all rows

methods.name: _restructureData
methods.description: Computes a chart readble format of data.

params.name: data
params.description: data to be charted

params.name: category
params.description: category to calssify

params.name: series
params.description: array of series information

methods.name: _seriesChanged
methods.description:
Observer on 'series' to redraw based on series property.
If a series object has 'dataUrl' property , fetches data and uses it to render the chart.

methods.name: _dataChanged
methods.description: Observer to render chart when data changes

methods.name: _showErrors
methods.description: Checks if error message should be displayed

methods.name: _registerChangeStream
methods.description: Registers a data stream to update the data

methods.name: _render
methods.description: Renders chart inside the chart container using xCharts

params.name: data
params.description: chart information to render

methods.name: _dataUrlChanged
methods.description: Observer on 'dataUrl' to fetch new data when the property is changed.

methods.name: _calcClass
methods.description: Computes the CSS class name for chart container.

params.name: data
params.description: data to render chart

params.name: series
params.description: data to group the chart data

params.name: category
params.description: property to classify chart data

params.name: hasDataFromSeries
params.description: flag denoting to get data from series.
